data.title: LA DANZA DE LA FORTUNA
data.meta_description: Original Argentine 29 inch x 43 inch Poster for the 1944 Luis Bayón Herrera Argentine Musical Comedy LA DANZA DE LA FORTUNA (THE DANCE OF FORTUNE) starring Luis Sandrini, Olinda Bozán, Héctor Quintanilla, Ana Gryn and Lolita Torres.  A millionaire woman at the point of death marries her young butler who wastes the whole fortune but she then recovers.  The poster is in very good folded condition.
data.text:
Original Argentine 29 inch x 43 inch Poster for the 1944 Luis Bayón Herrera Argentine Musical Comedy LA DANZA DE LA FORTUNA (THE DANCE OF FORTUNE) starring Luis Sandrini, Olinda Bozán, Héctor Quintanilla, Ana Gryn and Lolita Torres.

A millionaire woman at the point of death marries her young butler who wastes the whole fortune but she then recovers.

The poster is in very good folded condition.
